person.persName: Mark Leopold (Louisville, Kentucky, cigar and tobacco merchant)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, cigar and tobacco merchant. Native of Germany. Married to Barbara Oppenheimer Leopold in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on August 29, 1863. Father of Emma Leopold and Samuel Leopold. Cigar and tobacco merchant in partnership with N. Lemas in M. Leopold & Company in Louisville from 1862 to 1864. Cigar and tobacco merchant in partnership with J. Mayer, G. Mayer, and L. Mayer in M. Leopold & Company in Louisville from 1864 to 1865. Cigar and tobacco merchant in partnership with Jacob Leopold and Simon Leopold in M. Leopold & Company in Louisville in 1865.
